name: MÄHBÄHRT
description:
========= About the Game ========

In MÄHBÄHRT, you are mowing the lawn! Easy, isn’t it? But there is a catch. Your lawn mower needs energy, so keep the engine alive until the work is done!

========= How To Play ==========

W A S D for movement.

Or the Arrow keys.

Or a Gamepad.

Use SPACE to reset your mower.

======== Music and Sound Effects ========

If you do not like the music and / or the sound effects, you can turn them off by clicking on the sound icon

======== Feedback ========

If you have feedback or found a bug, please leave a comment here or on the itch.io page, or tweet me at @dievo.

======== Versions =======

Windows Versions are available via itch.io.

Sourcecode is available as Dropbox Download.

======== Software =========

Unity, Blender, Affinity Designer, Affinity Photo, Bosca Ceoil, Labchirp, Audacity.

======== Bugs =========

There should not be any major bugs left, but if you find one, please let me know.

A Ludum Dare 46 Compo entry. The game was made by Thomas Diehl in 48 hours. If you like it (or don’t) please leave a comment.

======== Thanks =========

I’d like to thank YOU for playing the game, I hope you had fun. 

Also I’d like to mention Impehnzia (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzfWju7SFoWLCyV_gDVCrGA). I learned a lot from his Blender videos and only wanted to delete Blender about 25 times this weekend.

Thanks again and have a nice day!

Thomas Diehl
